TEXT.TITLE: SOUTHWEST REALTY <SWL> IN RIGHTS OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: Southwest Realty Ltd said it has filed for a rights offering. It said for each three shares owned, a shareholder will receive a transferable right to purchase one additional share at 2.50 dlrs. The company said the offering is expected to be made on June 15. Reuter
